‚ÄúI'm really happy with it‚Ä¶ Honestly, the MyBMW App is a huge improvement over the old Connected Drive. The Digital Key finally works reliably ‚Äì a massive relief! The vehicle status information is displayed clearly, and I can easily manage my charging stations. The iDrive integration is also seamless. 

However, the app sometimes freezes briefly when switching between functions. Also, the ‚ÄúRoute to Charge‚Äù function could be more precise, it sometimes leads me to charging stations that are already occupied. The app has also crashed a couple of times, which is annoying, especially when I'm relying on it for navigation.  I hope BMW will fix these minor issues soon. Overall, still a good app, but there‚Äôs room for improvement. 4/5 stars.‚Äù
